sentences.english: Nor was his head trembling and shaking.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭也不再顫抖搖晃了。

sentences.english: Slip into a chair or remain upright, and sway back and forth.
sentences.chinese: 滑進一張椅子中，或者保持直立，來回的搖晃。

sentences.english: In desperation, the husband took out a five-dollar bill and waved it above the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，丈夫拿出一張五美元的鈔票在人羣上面搖晃晃。

sentences.english: The building was rocking about because of the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 由於地震，這幢樓在搖晃。

sentences.english: The aircraft was bumping up and down and jerking left to right.
sentences.chinese: 我們的機艙忽上忽下，左右搖晃。

sentences.english: It increased the amount of time spent in a dreamless stage called N2.
sentences.chinese: 搖晃增長延長了處於N2，即睡眠中無夢階段的時間。

sentences.english: The speculative market is like the tail wagging the dog.
sentences.chinese: 投機市場就像狗尾巴一樣搖晃。

sentences.english: Rabbit threw away a little table that wiggled .
sentences.chinese: 家兔扔掉了一張搖搖晃晃的小桌子。

sentences.english: In desperation, the husband took out a five-dollar bill and waved it above the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 無奈，丈夫拿出一張五美元的鈔票在人羣上面搖晃。

sentences.english: The old car faltered down the road .
sentences.chinese: 那臺老汽車搖晃着沿公路前進。

sentences.english: The building lunged violently, and some people were thrown to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 大樓猛烈搖晃，一些人被甩到地上。

sentences.english: He was obviously doped(up),shouting and weaving down the street.
sentences.chinese: 他明顯地被麻醉了，叫喊着，搖晃着走下街道。

sentences.english: Eucalyptus leaves twirled above her head in the whistling breeze.
sentences.chinese: 頭上的桉樹葉在呼呼的風中搖晃着。

sentences.english: Mark churned wildly through the muck trying to keep up.
sentences.chinese: 馬克在污泥中拚命搖晃着努力保持平衡。

sentences.english: There was a sharp earthquake last night,and the building rocked violently.
sentences.chinese: 昨夜發生了一次劇烈地震，建築物搖晃得很厲害。

definition: to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to float/to hover/also written 漂浮
